properties.name: Areas
properties.comment: Array of map areas that all use the same particle

methods.name: AFGProximitySubsystem
methods.comment: Sets default values for this actor's properties

methods.name: OnEnteredMapArea
methods.comment: Player entered a new map area

methods.name: OnPawnChanged
methods.comment: Owning controller got a new pawn

methods.name: GetParticleSystemFromMapArea
methods.comment: Gets particle system mapped to provided map area. Can return null if no mapping exist

methods.name: SpawnPooledDecal
methods.comment:
@param Rotation - rotation to place the decal in world space
@param LifeSpan - destroy decal component after time runs out (0 = infinite)

methods.name: BeginPlay
methods.comment: Called when the game starts or when spawned

properties.name: mMapAreaParticleCollection
properties.comment: Contains mappings of particle system that should play when entering a given map area

properties.name: mMaxNumDecals
properties.comment: How many decals we want to show
